column8: surrounded by her loving family. born january 15
column10: west virginia to james and hazel nelson. wanda was retired from the ohio bureau of motor vehicles after 35 years of service as a tenacious investigator. wanda had many friends at the bmv who continued to enjoy her company even after her retirement. wanda will be greatly missed by all who worked with her. she also enjoyed spending time with her family
column11: attending extra cirricular activities for her grandchildren
column12: nieces and nephews. she loved to travel and spend time with her many friends. she is survived by ""the love of her life""
column15: cheryl (christopher) scott and susie (dave) bowers; grandchildren
column26: nephews and many friends and loyal dog
column27: stitch. preceded in death by father james r. nelson
